website_summaries.verdict: The perfect blend of design, durability, and added features.
pros: The gooseneck arm is thick and secure
The light has a rechargeable battery that connects via USB and is equipped with multiple light settings from type to intensity
The Bluetooth remote serves as an excellent hands-free complement
cons: The overall product is bigger than expected
Some users have trouble getting it to stand without securing it by the clamp

customer_reviews.title: The only light you need!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this light!!! It has made my makeup reviews so much better and the price is amazing!!! It came packaged so well and I'm excited to own this light. 100% recommend. Attached are photos and a video of what I was sent and the look I created with the light. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dinkz

customer_reviews.title: but the light works great. The Bluetooth remote is not compatible with my ...
customer_reviews.text: The clip only stays well on certain width surfaces, but the light works great. The Bluetooth remote is not compatible with my 6s (and I thought I was outdated). So if you have an older iPhone it’ll work but otherwise don’t take that into consideration as part of what you pay for when choosing this package. I was pretty bummed about that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Worked once and died.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Mine worked ONCE a for about five minutes and then wouldn’t work again. I even replaced the battery in the remote clicker with a brand new one and NOTHING. This is a hunk of plastic that was, sadly, destined for the landfill. Invest in a more expensive product that actually does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Hoomie

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Selfie Taker
customer_reviews.text: This light has definitely surpassed my expectations! It has so many options for brightness, color, and shadowing. The cell phone clip fit my iPhone 7 wonderfully. I will advise that the clamp will only hold up to 2 /12- 3 inches max and it will not stand upright on its own. I felt that reading most of the reviews and seeing some of the photos, that it could stand upright without being clamped but it cannot. Other than that, it’s worked wonderfully and it’s drastically helped my lighting and increased my sales. Highly recommend this ring light!
customer_reviews.author: Callie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly love this! Works great for fb live videos and as a phone holder on my night stand so I can watch Netflix! Only two negetives. It grips on surfaces and does cause scratching anf gouging of the surface ots clipped too. And depending on how its positioned the phone can be too heavy for this to hold up. Still well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: texasfinest254

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Has no instructions and when you download app it's very difficult to work.
customer_reviews.author: Farys Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This helps me film videos and also take photos with better lighting. Contrary to other reviews, it holds me iPhone 8 Plus, with a bulky case on it, with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kristan Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This light is such a great tool for beginners. I got this light to do some Facebook lives on. I have horrible lighting in my apartment, and this light was much needed. It was easy to set up, and I could tell a huge difference in my videos. I recommend this to anyone who is starting out making videos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recently started a podcast this was a great addition to the equipmentthat I have
customer_reviews.text: Recently started a podcast this was a great addition to the equipmentthat I have. convenient, easy to use, great directions
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it was worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy! Only USB plug. Can’t get it to work like it should. Not sure if it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy North

customer_reviews.title: Its good, but could be better. Needs a stronger clamp.
customer_reviews.text: This is cool. I love the light & phone holder. However, sometimes the clamp isnt strong enough to keep it all stable. So....without the clamp, its almost impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: StephyKross

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: The clasp to attach to the table is not very strong and the light feels top heavy. Still using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lbanks

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. And does everything the discrimination of the product says it does. Easy to use. Good quality, my husband got it in February and it’s now the end of October and it still works perfectly. Good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great for Filming
customer_reviews.text: Great for streaming. Great for pictures and tiktok. Very versatile, very user friendly. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for live broadcasts
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the light is perfect. Easy to setup and puts the phone at the right height.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This stand has made doing live videos so easy. No need for extra lighting! This stand does it all! Everyone on my team now has this and loves it! I recommend this to all of my new team members!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Lighting is great for jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our Paparazzi LIVE fb shows. We need something taller though haha!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different light settings. Minus a star because of three control buttons not lighting up blue like the rest. Not a deal breaker by any means though.
customer_reviews.author: TBEAZ01

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I love it!!! It’s well made and totally worth the money and has made my life so much easier 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Terrill

customer_reviews.title: Don’t by if you you have a IPhone max or plus
customer_reviews.text: The only think is that does not hold well the IPhone X Maxx. That was disappointed to me
customer_reviews.author: VOLMMER

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The bendy parts (?) aren’t strong enough to hold my iPhone 8+ and the one for the light isn’t too sturdy either.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Everything works pretty good, easy to use and fast delivery! Though the Bluetooth remote is not with the package
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: No instructions came with product but was easy to figure out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. Perfect for makeup and other uses when needing more light
customer_reviews.author: paulette medina

customer_reviews.title: Best thing in Amazon - light and with remote
customer_reviews.text: I have bought wot of things on amazon but THIS IS THE FIRST THING I AM TRULY HAPPY WITH. I love taking selfie or for party I can never get enough of this, it has been the Best Buy ever I love it so much....... please if your looking to take pictures of your outfits. It has a remote extremely easy to connect.. the light has different light Options it also has a strong sturdy clamp that will allow do you to move a maneuver the light and the phone to take the perfect picture I am so in love with this please buy best thing ever
customer_reviews.author: Esther K Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Everyone had fun taking selfies and group pictures with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at a party - and it was a huge hit! Anyone can mount their phone to it, and pairing the remote is simple and quick. Everyone had fun taking selfies and group pictures with it. Loved how you can select the color type and intensity. Good quality, it holds the phone securely and the clip holds the stand itself very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money! Well Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This selfie ring light is absolutely amazing! i love it! It worked perfect on my trip to Cancun and my friends loved it! They actually bought one themself! I would highly recommend to anyone who is looking for a cost effective selfie light that has a selfie stick included.
customer_reviews.author: OregonMillwright

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Even though was bought for totally different purpose than what it is intended for. Bought to use as a “studio light kit” to photograph jewelry, make up & handbags for resale...this product exceeded my expectations!! Now everyone wants one! Also perfect for working on small tedious projects (like replacing iPhone screen) and I even use it as a desk lamp! Can adjust light from warm to cool white AND both have a VERY wide range of dimmable options. SO HAPPY! Buying 3 more!!
customer_reviews.author: Belles

customer_reviews.title: SO SUPER FAST SHIPPING🤩 plus I love my product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on may 1st and it stated that I will received my package on the 10th but wow I am very impressed because I have just received my package today and today is barely the 5th, SO SUPER FAST SHIPPING🤩 plus I love my product! Idk how to thank you! Awesome awesome qualities...
customer_reviews.author: Pachia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT & FUN PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Got one for myself and another as a gift. I have not used mine much, but the person I gifted it to absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Came with blue tooth remote and super easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: I received my light today I love it and the kids too
customer_reviews.text: I received my light today I love it and the kids too. It will make my selfies and pics of my clients look amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sad about this - you get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of using this the holder that holds your phone has broke and snapped - the light is nice- but its main purpose was to demo and hold my phone in a specific place. Super sad about this - you get what you pay for:(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent stand & remote.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth remote is cool and useful, light isn't as bright as I'd hoped. Phone stand was stable.
customer_reviews.author: pink

product_meta.title: Kekh Selfie Ring Light with Stand and Phone Holder for Live Stream and Makeup [3-Light Mode] [10-Level Brightness] Lazy Bracket with Flexible Long Arms Clip Mounts for iPhone & Free Bluetooth Remote
product_meta.description: Specifications: quantity: 24 cold + 24 warm our selfie ring Light has 48 LED light luminous point, so selfie light is illuminated uniformly than other seller's 12 cold+12 warm power: 5W clamp material: carbon steel Color: Black Power supply: USB 24 months warranty we support 100% Full refund for any defective product. Please contact us without any hesitation at any time if you have any problem. Cell phone holder with light metal light with a phone holder, convenient to video chat with someone as working on the computer, light is brighter. Take selfies in perfect lighting condition, different light settings to choose from. Excellent choice to use in bed for reading also and for video chat with friends and family. The LED light with Phone Holder helps bring glow and picture quality.Works well for anyone that like to take a lot of selfies.
feature_bullets: Professional tool: you can use this cell phone holder with ring light for creating a live stream, live show, selfie, video chat and make up. Perfect for YouTube, Facebook, Live musical, twich, Twitter etc.

Adjustable lights: 3 Color LED lights (Warm, cold, mixed) and 10 - level brightness settings. It does a great job of lighting up your face and surroundings when you make videos or take selfies at night or in dark areas, helps improve the Quality of photograph. It can also serve as a LED lamp for booking reading.

Hands free: ring light with both cell phone holder and a gooseneck hose, you can clip it on the table, desk and bed, so it's more convenient for you to watch shows on phone or make videos. With 360 Degree rotating feature, the holder is super flexible and can be bent to any angle you want.
Easy to use: easy control on cord to turn on/off, brightness and light color selection. The USB powered LED light works well with multiple devices: PC, Battery bank, wall charger.

Universal phone Holder: The phone holder supports smart phones from 2.4 in to 3.5 inch in width. Compatibility with most cellphones like iPhone X, 8, 8 Plus, 7 Plus, 7, 6S, Samsung Note 8, LG, HTC, etc.
